message:
What's the best resource to learn about TDD ?
Especially in PHP. Especially in Symfony :D

data.message: ana lesa mnazel course mn 3la tutsplus mn yoomen hwa lazeez esmo "Automated Testing With PHP"
symfony2 bysht3'lo bardo bl phpunit bs 3mleen shwyt 7agat auomated 7lwa zai enak t2rdar t automate el form submission w el mocking w shwyt 7agat zai kda
ana kont 3ayz a3rf el mechanism fel TDD men awl unit testing l7d functional we ma b3d zalk lw fe... ezay aktb el class b7es ykon testable .. we ezay a3ml test sa7 fe kol mar7la
kont etfragt abl kda 3la video kwyes le 7ad f google t2reban sanya aftker bs esmo w agebholak

aho la2eeto
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RlfLCWKxHJ0
da bytklm 3n eh

w el course brdo eli 2oltlak 3leh htla2i awel 5 videos mrakez m3ak awi f enak ezai tfakar fl unit test w ezai t3ml cases tsa3dak. w ezai tktev test case b design kwyes 3shan t2rdar t maintain it b3d kda lma t3'yar fl codebase bta3ak
el video dah bytklem enak ezai wnta btkteb el code t5aleh ashal for testing
hmmm nice.. ana l2et el tuts+ course ha7mlo we atfrg 3la da brdo ... msh 3arf 7ases el mwdo3 m7tag ktab kman :D

yup and btw it's a talent kman 3la fkra. zai ma mmkn 7ad yb2a 3ndo talent f enno y3ml design kwyes lel code lazem yb2a 3ndo talent enno ykteb test cases. w 3yza tsht3'al kteer 3la el 7kaya dy 3shan t-gain el talent dy
ah ana 7assha mohma gdn.. bs zy manta 3arf... TDD and Deadlines don't mix :D
w zai manta 3aref e7na sha3'aleen f masr :D ya3ny m7desh by3ml test cases asln kollo mashy bl 7obb :D
blzbt :D .. bs lazm nghyr el wak3 !
n3'yaro ya 7beeby w malo "b soot 3adel emam" :D
Kont fr7an gedn bl post w mtab3 kol comment 2ol a5ern 7ad bytklm f TDD bs a5r comments gabtly a7bat :D

Abdulrahman Mohamed man never get down. 3shan t3ml contribution f opensource project you've to know about test cases. w le fdlt t2ol da msh ht3lmaha 3shan msh hasta5dmaha fa msh htt3lm 7aga.
7agat kteer mn eli mt3lmha msh bst5dmaha fl sho3'l bsbb el da3't w kda bs bardo at some point of time htsta5dmaha
Actually adapting TDD will save you from future headaches that will eventually blow your deadline
Good resources guys, for me I think the most important thing to consider when writing a testable class is to know how to deal well with dependency injection, for sake of easy mocking later
Moaaz Goda exactly, that's what's the video is talking about

The video you've recommended, Alaa, Is really useful (Y)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RlfLCWKxHJ0
3edd el gamayel, w el course lma tnzlo hy3gbak bardo ;)
ya3m da ragl rosy ta2rebn we awl ma etklm we23t mn el d7k :D
Hhhhhhhhh LA ya 3m da shaklo hendy :D bs wllahy wad zai el 3assal :D
Symfony so far is the best PHP Framwork all the rest are crap!
PHP itself is a crappy language :D
